sources.title: Resolution Song | Full Hallmark Movie | Drama | Torrei Hart
sources.description:
Resolution Song - A young man's family torn apart by tragedy reaches out to begin rebuilding trust and seek healing by through the only thing that speaks through pain; the healing power of music.
2018.  Stars: Kennedy Lea Slocum, Torrei Hart, Ella Joyce
